column4: do you have to install the w32codecs and a 32bit mplayer to get most stuff to play in amd64? cause I've followed the guides to install the w64codecs from medibuntu and -nothing- is playing still
w32codecs is for 32bit systems, and w64codecs is for 64bit systems - they should be the same content
ok, thanks.  Not sure why nothing seems to play, these aren't obscure codecs or anything
what media player are you using?  try installing mplayer and see if it will play anything (or vlc if you wish)
